original_text: From thirty years old up to fifty years old, you shall list them, everyone who can come on duty, to do the service of the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 삼십 세부터 오십 세까지 회막에서 복무하고 봉사할 모든 자를 계수하라

sentences.original_text: From thirty years old up to fifty years old
everyone who can come on duty
sentences.korean_translation: 직무를 수행할 수 있는 모든 사람

sentences.original_text: to do the service of the tent of meeting
